                                        <a href="http://www.mlive.com/placead/">Place an Ad</a>
                                    
                                    <span class="none" data-state="2" data-key="12580"></span>
                                </li>
                            
                                <li class="" style="">
                                    
                                        <span class="nolink">Follow Us</span>
                                    
                                    <span class="next" data-state="2" data-key="12600"></span>
                                </li>
                            
                            
                            
                            
                            <li id="adv_li_subscribe" data-state="2" data-key="subscribe"><span class="nolink">Subscribe</span>
                                <span class="next" data-state="2" data-key="subscribe"></span>
                            </li>
                            
                        
                        </ul>

                        <div class="SiteSponsor nomobilead injectedAd" id="SiteSponsor"></div>

    function getToprailVersion() { return 1; }

    <div role="main" id="main">
      
      
      <div class="wrapper">
        <div id="content">
          <div class="hnews">
            <div id="article">
              <div class="wrapper">
                                  <div class="social_sidebar sticky">
                    <div class="CommentCount">
                      <a href="#comments"><span id="echo_comment_count"></span></a>
                      <div class="label">comments</div>
                    </div>
	                
                    	<div id="social_share_desktop"></div><!-- /social_share_desktop -->
                    
                  </div>


                <!-- headline - wide -->	
<!-- Premium Blog -->

<!-- /Premium Blog -->
<h1>Farm-to-table, Asian restaurants coming to Bay City indoor market</h1>
<div class="clearfix"></div>
<!-- /headline -->

                <div id="article_container">
                    <script type="text/javascript">
            
            
            
            
            
            m_gallery = "chubby_duck_expands_to_bay_cit";
            m_gallery_id = "22490189";
            m_gallery_total = "10";
            m_gallery_blog_id = "4468";
            m_gallery_related_slide = "0";
            m_gallery_creation_date = "Monday, April 17, 2017,  9:18 AM";
            m_gallery_permalink = "http://photos.mlive.com/4468/gallery/chubby_duck_expands_to_bay_cit/index.html";
            m_gallery_pagetype = "embed";
        </script>
    

    

    
    

    

    <div id="multimedia_main_gallery">
        <div class="gallery_wrapper">
            <div id="galleria" >

	<br/>on April 17, 2017 at  9:59 AM, updated <span class="updated" title="2017-04-18T17:29:21Z">April 18, 2017 at  1:29 PM</span>

            'link':'http://www.mlive.com/news/bay-city/index.ssf/2017/04/farm-to-table_asian_restaurant.html',
            'desc': 'Chef Ian Diem of the Flint Farmer\'s Market\'s Chubby Duck will add a \"deluxe\" Bay City branch and also head City Market\'s farm-to-table restaurant.',

                    <div id="article_inset">
                      <div id="story-package" >
                        <!-- series -->


<!-- /series -->

 <!-- Aka Story Package -->
                        <!-- gallery-preview -->

 <!-- Aka Secondary Package -->
                        <div class="adunit nomobilead" id="StoryAd"></div>

                    <!-- Article -->
	
	<div class="entry-content">

		
		<div class="ndn_embed" id="ndn-video-player-1" data-config-distributor-id="90299"></div>

		<p><strong>FLINT, MI -&nbsp;</strong>From a glance at his menu, one wouldn't assume that Ian Diem is a classically-trained French chef.&nbsp;</p>
<p>The chalkboard above the Chubby Duck's glass-walled booth at the Flint Farmer's Market advertises maki and temaki, two forms of traditionally Japanese hand-rolled sushi. His ingredient list includes bulgogi -- the tender beef used in Korean barbecue -- daikon radish, eel sauce, tempura shrimp and shiitake mushrooms.</p>
<p>A sign to the side of the register hints at Diem's classical training: the soup of the day, served with every sushi meal order, is a French bisque. Diem says he enjoys fusing the contrasting flavors of Japanese and French cuisine to offer a unique culinary experience.</p>
<p>He'll&nbsp;have plenty of space to put his&nbsp;expertise to use at the farm-to-table restaurant he will head this summer alongside a new, larger branch of Chubby Duck at City Market in Bay City.</p>
<p>Diem&nbsp;dubbed his farm-to-table concept The Burdock Root after a root vegetable commonly used in Japanese cuisine and herbal medicine that grows throughout Michigan. There he'll serve up dishes that are more in line with his French background, and the menu will be a more traditional European style that Diem refers to as "farm and country."</p>
<p>"We wanted some five-star food," Diem said. "We're excited to meet all of the vendors and enjoy all of the good food there."</p>
<p>Diem says Bay City's Chubby Duck "Deluxe" will have a similar or identical menu, but will feature an expanded grocery section selling Asian-inspired sauces, spices and packaged goods as well as seating.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Prices at Flint's Chubby Duck range from $7 temaki "cones" - sushi creations wrapped in an edible cone of seaweed designed for on-the-go customers - to $9 combos and maki rolls ranging from $10 to $14 apiece. The farm-to-table restaurant, which will operate out of a much larger space with a separate entrance from the main market, will have an entirely different menu and pricing.</p>
<p>City Market is slated to open in mid-2017. In the meantime, customers can visit the Chubby Duck's booth near the northwest entrance of the Flint Farmer's Market, 300 E. 1<sup>st</sup> St. during the market's open hours, 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Tuesday and Thursday and 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Saturday.</p>
		
		

		
		<div class="ndn_embed" id="ndn-video-player-2" data-config-distributor-id="90299"></div>

	</div>
<!-- /Article -->

                  <div class="box_grayoutline">
  <div>
        <div class="box_top_left"><!-- --></div><div class="box_top_right"><!-- --></div><div class="box_top"><!-- --></div>
  </div>

        <div class="clear"><!--  --></div>

        <div class="box_bottom_left"><!-- --></div><div class="box_bottom_right"><!-- --></div><div class="box_bottom"><!-- --></div>

<section class="special-report promo-spot" id="special_report">
    <header><h1>Michigan&#39;s Best</h1></header>

    <div class="promo-box">

        <p></p>

		<!-- Nielsen code moved to bottom1 -->


		
			
				
					<script type="text/javascript" src="//static.advance.net/static/common/js/galleria/adv_galleria_settings.js"></script>
					<link rel="stylesheet" href="http://media.mlive.com/design/alpha/css/moderate.css" type="text/css" >
					<script type="text/javascript" defer src="http://media.mlive.com/design/alpha/js/moderate.js"></script>
				
				
					
					
					

    
    <script type="text/javascript">
        window._taboola = window._taboola || [];
        _taboola.push({flush: true});
    </script>

					<script type="text/javascript" src="//static.advance.net/static/common/js/libs/modernizr-2.6.2.min.js"></script>
				
			
		

		
			
<script type="text/javascript">
 (function() {
!function(o){function n(e){if(t[e])return t[e].exports;var i=t[e]={exports:{},id:e,loaded:!1};return o[e].call(i.exports,i,i.exports,n),i.loaded=!0,i.exports}var t={};return n.m=o,n.c=t,n.p="",n(0)}({0:function(o,n,t){"use strict";function e(o){return o&&o.__esModule?o:{"default":o}}function i(){if(!j){j=!0,window._sp_=window._sp_||{},H=window._sp_.config=window._sp_.config||{},K=H.content_control_callback||window._sp_lock,N=H.account_id||H.client_id||window.sp_cid;for(var o in H)T[o]=H[o]}}function r(o,n){var t=arguments.length>2&&void 0!==arguments[2]?arguments[2]:"",e=new Image;e.src="//"+E+"/cct?v="+encodeURIComponent(x)+"&ct=1&cid="+encodeURIComponent(N)+"&l="+encodeURIComponent(o.toString())+"&rc="+encodeURIComponent(n)+"&d0="+encodeURIComponent(t)}function  };

};

window._sp_.config.mms_client_data_callback = function showit(e) {

               window.abTestingTrackingString += adblklabel + '||';
	       var spevt = document.createEvent("Event");
               spevt.initEvent("spoptly", true, false);
               document.dispatchEvent(spevt); 
               }

};

window._sp_.mms.cmd.push(function() {
 window._sp_.mms.startMsg();
 });
